channel.title: Group Singing on
channel.description: Recent content in Group Singing on

item.title: Join Choir, Live Longer!
item.description: Well, at least that’s true for a group of people participating in a choir in a Connecticut town, as found in the results of a joint study by Harvard and Yale Universities (2008). If that’s not enough to convince you, this article from CMUSE gives you a few more reasons to join choral singing.*Strengthen feeling of togetherness . In today’s increasingly “me first” society, it is nice to find a tribe to belong to.
